channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- subscription-manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- subscription-manager

item.title: CVE-2017-2663|2024-08-05T14:02:07.221Z -- red%20hat -- subscription-manager
item.description: It was found that subscription-manager's DBus interface before 1.19.4 let unprivileged user access the com.redhat.RHSM1.Facts.GetFacts and com.redhat.RHSM1.Config.Set methods. An unprivileged local attacker could use these methods to gain access to private information, or launch a privilege escalation attack.
